title: The Cosy Club
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, British, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. UK chain restaurant. Enter this 7300 sq. ft. location at the mall ground floor behind Hugo Boss store. Quirky casual dining, drinking and lounging in a homey environment. Serves comfort food, sandwiches, panini, and breakfast until 10pm. Has a separate vegan menu. The bar and dining are divided into two areas, but the whole place is open-plan.
